column5: I put the kids to work on some fresh carp bait!    Mom wasn't to impressed that I let them do it AFTER they had a bath! haha            Took him a good 10 minutes or so to peel ONE cob!            If the rain holds off the kid and I will be heading down for some local carp action.... And if we get rained out we'll join the dogs for a little of this instead...    Hopefully we'll have a report this afternoon!  Cheers, Ryan & the kidz
Yup. Mother knows best. The kids could catch a nasty cold. Other than that? Looks like good old fashioned family fun!
ah it wasn't very cold..she was more so concerned about them gettin' dirty again... part of living in the country..
Cute Ryan.  Good luck with the carp today

Go get 'em, Ryan!!  FYI, we did get the boat out on "the Bay" yesterday, got a few (very few, lol) keepers, just had them with eggs for breakie.  Not too much action, in the "pack".  Sounds like Friday was the better day.

I'm reporting you to Children s Services, you obviously abuse them and are an unfit parent.... (Hey... can you report me so they can come and get mine.. LOL. College is coming faster than I anticipated...)
Thanks for the info, Dan!!!  The boys are a little hesistant on fish at times, but, Caelan's eyes lit up when he tasted that perch (half Cajun/half garlic butter Fish Crisp) this morning!
I was thinking the same thing unless of course he's paying them minimum wage lol Richard
Room and board for a little labor isn`t a bad deal. Did they get to sample the bait?
